original_title: Ginger Snaps: Blood, Teeth, and Fur
overview: A one-hour behind the scenes featurette with the cast and crew about the Ginger Snaps trilogy released with the Scream Factory Blu-Ray collectors edition in 2014. This mini documentary offers a wealth of information, answering most of the questions that could be posed of the film. Importantly, the cast and crew discuss not only the success of the film, but also what they wish they could have done better.
title: Ginger Snaps: Blood, Teeth, and Fur
